ul.li: Former Members: Old Glory (deceased), Gasblaster (incarcerated), Sundowner (deceased)
Affiliates: Senator Stephen Markborough, Grey Ghost (deceased)
First Appearance: Blood Brothers Vol II #1

section.title: Description:
section.p: Like all good terrorist organizations, the American Militia is divided into cells, or rather ‘parishes’ as they are called by the Militia.

section.title: History
section.p: History: The American Militia first came to the attention of the Paranormal Security Force (see Blood Brothers) in August of 2014 when some members of the Militia battled with the PSF in Louisiana.
The American Militia was created by Braz King.
